alert.note: Alert for Hardee; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hardee and southern Polk Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Wales, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Jan Phyl Village, Poinciana, Fort Meade, Crooked Lake Park, Dundee, Frostproof, Eagle Lake, Lake Hamilton, Hillcrest Heights, Highland Park, Homeland, Alturas, Indian Lake Estates, Cypress Gardens, Lake Wales Municipal Airport and Babson Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
